Class ShotEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.examples.spaceinvaders.Entity
      • org.lwjgl.examples.spaceinvaders.ShotEntity

  • public class ShotEntity
extends Entity
    An entity representing a shot fired by the player's ship
